nodes.text: The Bakura Trace was a hyperlane in the Outer Rim Territories that connected the planet Endor to Sanyassa and then Sanyassa to Ast Kikorie in the Moddell sector before continuing on from Ast Kikorie beyond the borders of the sector. It shared its name with the Wild Space planet Bakura.

In the new Star Wars canon, the Bakura Trace was mentioned in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 18. The cluster originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in the 1994 novel The Courtship of Princess Leia, which was written by Dave Wolverton.
